description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. Check your phone to see where enemies are lurking as you hunt for items throughout the house. Dart through rooms and choose your hiding spots carefully. WARNING: Contains jump scares that will make your friends scream.
